page.title: 15BUILDINGS IN ABBOTSKERSWELL
page.content: Abbotskerswell school was built in 1876. The cost of it to be built was Â£600, including Â£100 paid for the site.When it was first built it only had two classrooms. There was a room for 75 children aged 3_14 years.There was a head master and one or two assistant mistresses. There are now four teachers and a hundred children. There are two pubs in Abbotskerswell. Their names are Court Farm Inn and the Butchers Arms. The Court Farm Inn used to be an old farm and it still has the old barn in which they used to milk the cows. The Court Farm Inn has a euchre team, which is a card game. It is owned by Whitbread Brewery and has two bars. The other pub in Abbotskerswell is the Butchers Arms. This pub is also owned by Whitbread. The Butchers Arms is at the end of the village and is a small pub.
